attributes.action: Retain mask wearing on public transport while UK is managing the Covid pandemic.
attributes.background: Retain mandatory mask wearing, to protect both transportation staff and travelling public from spreading the Covid-19 virus or catching and then suffering the disease, while travelling on public transport whilst the UK is managing the Covid-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
